attributes.action: Policies should be changed so that teenagers ( 13 and above ) can do more jobs
attributes.background: I have been looking for a job for 6months + but it feels like where ever I ask says I’m too young and insurance won’t allow to employ me - so these laws will be changed ! Giving young people access to money and build their skills for adulthood

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The law allows teenagers aged over 13 to work, but with certain restrictions. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/child-employment/restrictions-on-child-employment

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how you would like those laws changed.
